com.mapgroup.classificator.boundary

Class MultiServer.ServeOneClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.mapgroup.classificator.boundary.MultiServer.ServeOneClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    MultiServer

    private class MultiServer.ServeOneClient
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class contains all the functionality to manage the request of a single client

        public MultiServer.ServeOneClient(java.net.Socket s)
                           throws java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • predictClass

        private java.lang.String predictClass(DecisionTree tree)
                               throws NoTreeExists,
                                      UnknownValueException,
                                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                      java.io.IOException
        Inspects the decision tree constructed following the options chosen by the user in order to get the predicted value.
        Parameters:
        tree - the current decision tree
        Returns:
        the predicted value for this prediction session
        Throws:
        NoTreeExists - if no available tree was present
        UnknownValueException - if an incorrect choice was selected by the user
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - unable to read object from the client
        java.io.IOException - error in communicating with the client

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts the communication with the client and it waits until the client ask to the server to close the connection or some errors occurred while the connection is started.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
